titles.title: STAND Against Emerging Opioids Act
Scheduling Tianeptine and Analogues Now to Defend Against Emerging Opioids Act
STAND Against Emerging Opioids Act
To amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide for the scheduling of tianeptine as a schedule III substance, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
